mapper.sql: full_short_url, gid, date, cnt, country, province, city, adcode, create_time, update_time, del_flag
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_locale_stats ( ) VALUES (#{linkLocaleStats.fullShortUrl}, #{linkLocaleStats.gid}, #{linkLocaleStats.date}, #{linkLocaleStats.cnt}, #{linkLocaleStats.country}, #{linkLocaleStats.province}, #{linkLocaleStats.city}, #{linkLocaleStats.adcode}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + #{linkLocaleStats.cnt}
mapper.select: SELECT province, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM t_link_locale_stats WHERE full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{param.gid} AND date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{param.startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{param.endDate}, ' 23:59:59') GROUP BY province
